mapper.select: select auto_recharge_record_id id, petrol_num petrolNum, recharge_amount rechargeAmount, price price, status status, message message, recharge_time rechargeTime, order_time orderTime, create_at createAt, update_at updateAt from czb_auto_recharge_record where auto_recharge_record_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update czb_auto_recharge_record set petrol_num = #{petrolNum}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, message = #{message} where auto_recharge_record_id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select COUNT(petrol_num) as sumPeople, SUM(recharge_amount) as sumRechargeAmount , SUM(price) as sumPrice from czb_auto_recharge_record
AND (order_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )

select count(status) as successPeople from czb_auto_recharge_record
AND (order_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and status = 1
